works.description:
This page contains my review of the DVD  
Chopper Chicks in Zombie Town.

The first paragraph has been copied and pasted into a page the Cinemazone 

Blog. I was not consulted about this and I did not give permission for my 

work to be plagiarized.

I did a check and found that many of the pages on this blog contain  
material copied and pasted from imdb.com and also from other blogs and   
websites.
